title: Split output pane into thinking and output sections
description: Split the output pane into two sections: a collapsible 'Thinking' section at the top (dimmed, showing agent reasoning) and the main 'Output' section below (showing response text). Use a separator line between them. Thinking section should auto-collapse when empty.
closed_reason: Added thinking field to Model, handlers for AgentThinkingMsg and AgentTextMsg messages, buildOutputContent method to combine thinking+output with separator, and updateOutputViewport helper. Thinking section is dimmed, auto-collapses when empty, and separated from output with '─── Thinking ───' and '─── Output ───' headers.
